metadata.title: CVE-2019-14734 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
AdPlug 2.3.1 has multiple heap-based buffer overflows in CmtkLoader::load()in mtk.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14734` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

adplug-utils - 2.3.3+dfsg-2
libadplug-2.3.3-0 - 2.3.3+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: adplug package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.3+dfsg-2').
